mapper.select: CREATE TABLE ${"CALL_TRAFFIC_" + YM}( C_DATE CHAR(8) NULL, GET_TIME CHAR(2) NULL, BH NUMBER(1) NULL, MH NUMBER(1) NULL, MSC_ID VARCHAR2(7) NULL, RNC_ID VARCHAR2(4) NULL, BTS_ID VARCHAR2(5) NULL, SECTOR VARCHAR2(4) NULL, FA VARCHAR2(4) NULL, C_UID VARCHAR2(10) NULL, BTS_NAME VARCHAR2(50) NULL, BRANCH_ID CHAR(4) NULL, LAREA_ID CHAR(4) NULL, MTSO_ID CHAR(4) NULL, MTSO_TEAM_ID CHAR(4) NULL, OPTEAM_ID VARCHAR2(4) NULL, REGION_ID VARCHAR2(4) NULL, PART_ID VARCHAR2(4) NULL, WEEK_ID NUMBER(4) NULL, ATT NUMBER NULL, SEI NUMBER NULL, ANS NUMBER NULL, AHT_CS NUMBER NULL, AHT_PS NUMBER NULL, AHT_ERL_CS NUMBER NULL, AHT_ERL_PS NUMBER NULL, AVGCST_CS NUMBER NULL, AVGCST_PS NUMBER NULL, HSDPA_ANS NUMBER NULL, CD NUMBER NULL, ORG_ATT NUMBER NULL, ORG_SEI NUMBER NULL, ORG_ANS NUMBER NULL, ORG_CD NUMBER NULL, ORG_CS_ATT NUMBER NULL, ORG_CS_SEI NUMBER NULL, ORG_CS_ANS NUMBER NULL, ORG_CS_CD NUMBER NULL, ORG_PS_ATT NUMBER NULL, ORG_PS_SEI NUMBER NULL, ORG_PS_ANS NUMBER NULL, ORG_PS_CD NUMBER NULL, O_ATT_CIR NUMBER NULL, O_SEI_CIR NUMBER NULL, O_ANS_CIR NUMBER NULL, O_CD_CIR NUMBER NULL, TER_ATT NUMBER NULL, TER_SEI NUMBER NULL, TER_ANS NUMBER NULL, TER_CD NUMBER NULL, TER_CS_ATT NUMBER NULL, TER_CS_SEI NUMBER NULL, TER_CS_ANS NUMBER NULL, TER_CS_CD NUMBER NULL, TER_PS_ATT NUMBER NULL, TER_PS_SEI NUMBER NULL, TER_PS_ANS NUMBER NULL, TER_PS_CD NUMBER NULL, T_ATT_CIR NUMBER NULL, T_SEI_CIR NUMBER NULL, T_ANS_CIR NUMBER NULL, T_CD_CIR NUMBER NULL ) TABLESPACE AD_BEAR12 PCTFREE 10 PCTUSED 0 INITRANS 1 MAXTRANS 255 STORAGE ( INITIAL 64 K MINEXTENTS 1 MAXEXTENTS UNLIMITED ) LOGGING NOCACHE MONITORING NOPARALLEL
